dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is widely utilized in research on driving algorithms, serving as a benchmark for tasks like 2D object detection and optical flow. It features a rich collection of RGB, LiDAR, and GPS/IMU data, albeit predominantly under daytime and clear weather conditions.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving that includes a variety of weather conditions and diverse moving objects, making it suitable for training and evaluating perception models.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:description: The Waymo Open Dataset is designed for scalability in perception for autonomous driving, providing a large-scale dataset that includes diverse driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: Waymo

dcterms:description: The Zenseact open dataset is a large-scale and diverse multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, designed to cover various driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: Zenseact

dcterms:description: BDD100K is a diverse driving dataset that supports heterogeneous multitask learning, featuring a wide range of weather conditions and driving scenarios.

dcterms:description: Ithaca365 is an autonomous driving dataset recorded along a 15km route under diverse weather and lighting conditions, providing scenario image data with balanced labels.
